content: Huh? Where is my phone?! {短暂停}Ah, ah, ah—! Now I remember, I was looking for my phone!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content: Oh dear! Let me help you find your phone!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
I shall remain at your Astralink to continue my in-depth research.
This is where I'll put down my roots!
I must maximize its significance to its fullest potential!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content: Mors?
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2
初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Is this what they call "instant chemistry"?! Meeting you for the first time,
I feel like we have endless topics to discuss!
In that case...
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
You? You must be Esassani!
Nice to meet you... would you mind waiting until I finish
recording the ecological data here? I'd like to take a few more photos on my phone...
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Let me mentally "reconstruct" the scene:
I was calling Mobai when...
I witnessed my vehicle being swept up into the air by the turbulence.
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content: The ground around us is glowing, and the leaves on the trees are all star-shaped! I guess this unique ecosystem is the cause!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
If we can verify this hypothesis,
it means we've conquered the ecological impact of turbulent flows on world bubbles - we'll never have to worry about "uninhabitable" conditions again!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
I don't mean to disturb— Oh... my apologies!
This discovery is quite significant for the World Bubble's ecological research,
I got carried away, however...
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Please, you must allow me,
To join your Astralink!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Just stay here and
keep poor Mors company while he
<color=#8AAB4B>looks for his phone</color>~!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Theoretically, a world bubble affected by turbulence
and experiencing "reverse fog" should absolutely not
have a thriving, vibrant ecosystem, and yet you do!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Since you put it that way, I'll concede to your logic.
The phone must be lodged in one of these trees.
Let's <color=#8AAB4B>shake</color> the trees around here and see if we can find it!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content: E-excuse me...
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content: Excellent! That's precisely what I was waiting to hear!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2
初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content: <size=30>The shape of these leaves... It's exactly like the one described in the Academia's ancient manuscripts.</size> I must record this! Hmm?
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Our first meeting
should have been more ceremonious, but I apologize...
I'm now completely—
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
In a moment of quick thinking... I hugged the tree!
When I woke up later, my phone was gone...
I got it! The phone must be stuck in one of these trees.
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
The car flying away is inconsequential, but my phone...
All my research data from the journey
is in there...
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
What an exhilarating discovery!
To think that along your Astralink
lies such an extraordinary sanctuary!
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Great, great, great! I, Esassani, declare you're in!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, let's get
Mors back quickly so I can check on the broken Lumia.
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
You're impossible, you know that!
I'll drive around and help you look for your car.
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>...
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2
初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2

content:
Pitiful?!
To think I'm being treated like a child by Esassani...
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, I... I really...
info: 初遇墨尔斯-找手机_主流程文本2
